About Token Counting

How it works

Tokens are pieces of words used by AI models. On average, 1 token ≈ 4 characters or 0.75 words for English text. For OpenAI models, we use the exact tiktoken encoding. For Claude and other models, we use accurate approximations.

Why it matters

Models have token limits that constrain both input (your prompt) and output (the response). Understanding token counts helps you optimize prompts and estimate API costs accurately.
